ai-patthana15.33:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.33:0.3_0: Talking forgets, doing what is skillful,
ai-patthana15.33:1.1_0: She doesn’t give rise to skillful thoughts.
ai-patthana15.33:1.1_1: All skillful teaching doesn’t give rise to a skillful quality. ...
ai-patthana15.33:1.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.33:2.1_0: Desire doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.33:3.1_0: Such an incompetent teaching doesn’t arise because of an undecided reason. ...
ai-patthana15.33:3.1_2: What is not the reason for two reasons.
